features.heading: Native Amazon UI
features.body: Made UI experience friendly to the user which makes it look actual real compare to Amazon website.

features.heading: Real world search functionality
features.body: It allows customers to search for products by keyword, category, or brand.

features.heading: User account settings
features.body: The user account feature allows customers to create and manage their own account and payment options.

features.heading: Real-time data
features.body: Supported real-time market cap and price action of all the cyptocurrency coins.

features.heading: Past data presentation
features.body: The chart will show the cryptocurrency coin's price at various points in time.

features.heading: Indian currency supportable
features.body: User can preview price of specific coin in Indian currency: Ruppee.

features.heading: Multiple choice questions
features.body: A great way to test your knowledge, you can select the correct answer from a list of options.

features.heading: Custom mode
features.body: Provided various level of categories and levels according to user choice.

features.heading: Highlight answer
features.body: The feature allows users to see which answers they got correct and which answers they got incorrect.

features.heading: Categorization
features.body: This allows users to organize their recipes into different categories for easy reference.

features.heading: Search various recipes
features.body: Just search for recipes by name, and you'll be presented with a variety of options.

features.heading: Tips and guide
features.body: Include tips on what kitchen supplies to use, how to prepare ingredients, and how to cook the dish.
